name: Meet Me on the Mountain
description:
When Julia's memories shatter, she finds herself stuck in her own thoughts, blocked by locks of her own design. With only her intuition to guide her, she must search for the things to piece together the painful truth she's trying to keep from herself.

Help Julia by combining or separating colors to solve puzzles and collect memories about a person who wants to meet her at the mountain.

Controls:

  • AD to move
  • O to interact

Thanks for playing!

Credits:

Aleksei Fernandez - 2D Artist

Waki Salvador - 2D Artist

Nissie Arcega - Narrative Design

Rwen Narvarte - Sound Design

This is a submission for Game Jam Plus Manila. #GJ+ #GameJamPlus2021 #beourplus1
